title: Colorado lawmakers undeterred despite Trump order on state AI laws

title: The signs that Amazon is losing its grip on Christmas
description: Online shoppers are turning to artificial intelligence bots to find the cheapest deals
content:
If you still need to do some eleventh-hour Christmas shopping, one place above all others is likely to spring to mind.
